This affordable MagSafe car mount from LISEN is an easy buy if you’d like a low-profile way to keep your iPhone visible and secure while driving. I like the streamlined dash-mounted look of this model.

items.title: LG’s new UltraGear display is the ‘world’s fastest OLED monitor’ with 720Hz refresh rate, now $200 off (All-time low)
items.summary:
We’re tracking some great $799.99 shipped. This model was introduced last August as the “world’s fastest OLED monitor” and it hit the shelves shortly after in December at $1,000. It’s now seeing its first big price drop at 20% off – matched directly at LG. Today’s deal shaves $200 off its usual going rate to mark a new best price to beat. There’s a lot to like here beyond just the 720Hz support, which you’ll definitely want to try at least once, and you can learn more about it below.

items.title: VPN flaws allowed Chinese hackers to compromise dozens of Ivanti customers, says report
